alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN BRACKEN, NORTHEASTERN PENDLETON, SOUTHERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Neville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Augusta, Felicity, Hamersville, Higginsport, Moscow, Neville, Chilo, Ivor, Point Isabel, Feesburg, Stoney Point and Foster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
